attributes.action: increase funding for and encourage the construction and development of new nuclear power stations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is now generally accepted that climate change is a reality, and that fossil fuels are rapidly running out. Thus, a replacement source of energy must be found. Since renewable energy sources will take a good deal of time to develop to an effective level, we the undersigned petition the prime minister to help foster nuclear power, as an effective non-carbon emitting alternative to fossil fuels, to avoid the terrible risks of climate change.
